title: FDJ-Suez Bolsters ‘Project Vollering’ Tour de France Mission With Long-Term Sponsor Boost
content:
FDJ and Suez commit to French 'super team' through 2028, reports that bike behemoth Specialized will follow Vollering to the team rumble on.

Read the full article at FDJ-Suez Bolsters ‘Project Vollering’ Tour de France Mission With Long-Term Sponsor Boost on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
